message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high quality and unique features, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your success. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $15000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to accept $15000. Would you consider lowering the price to $12000?
